This cross checks retests the strategy with higher precision.

This cross check performs Walk-Forward Matrix evaluation of the strategy using the settings below.
Be aware that WF Matrix is extremely slow, it consists of running a number of WF optimizations, which themselves are very slow.
The number of backtests required can easily grow to thousands or even tens of thousands for one WF optimization,
so it is a good idea to limit the maximum tests for one WF optimization to some realistic number.

Die Anzahl an erforderlichen Backtests kann schnell auf mehrere Tausend pro WF-Optimierung anwachsen,
es ist also empfehlenswert, die Maximale Anzahl an Tests pro WF-Optimierung realistisch zu begrenzen.

This cross check performs Walk-Forward Optimization of the strategy using the settings below.
Be aware that WF optimization is very slow, it requires repeated backtests of the strategy in different time ranges and using different parameter values.
The number of backtests required can easily grow to thousands or even tens of thousands for one WF optimization, so it is a good idea to limit the maximum tests to some realistic number.

Cross checks allow you to run a sequence of further tests (cross checks) once the strategy passes the basic filters.
You can have strategy retested with higher precision or run a Monte Carlo simulation or Optimization on it.

Fehler bei der Initialisierung:

Wenn du zusätzlich Filter definierst, kannst du automatisch Strategien verwerfen, die den Cross-Check-Filter nicht bestehen - so kannst du einen "Strategietest-Trichter" erstellen, in welchem nur die Strategien gespeichert werden, die alle Tests bestehen (dies trifft nur auf den Generator zu).
